title: Definitions
context: [ยง572B-1] Definitions. As used in this chapter, unless the context otherwise requires: &ldquo;Agent&rdquo; means the person or persons appointed as an agent or agents by the department of health pursuant to section 572-5. &ldquo;Civil union&rdquo; means a union between two individuals established pursuant to this chapter. &ldquo;Partner&rdquo; means an individual who is a party to a civil union established pursuant to this chapter. [L 2011, c 1, pt of ยง2]
